title: Sir David Amess death: Show kindness and love, say MP's family
content:
1. Sir David Amess death: Show kindness and love, say MP's family  BBC News
  2. David Amess stabbing: Britain considers police protection, security measures for MPs  The Washington Post
  3. Sir David Amess: MP murder suspect held under Terrorism Act  BBC News
  4. The Observer view on the killing of Sir David Amess  The Guardian
  5. Unless we assign every politician a 24-hour security detail they remain vulnerable - Euan McColm  The Scotsman
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
